website_summaries.verdict: Offers a nice decorative look and good aged flavor, although some had trouble getting this barrel to seal correctly.
pros: Available in a 1, 2 or 3 liter size
Kit includes a bung, spigot, barrel stand, instructions, and two bottles of Highland Malt Scotch Whiskey essence
Handcrafted from American white oak with black steel bands
Has a classic barrel look, and ages spirits well
cons: Some buyers report problems with trying to seal it (leaking)

customer_reviews.title: Read before you buy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased this barrel in hopes to have something ready for the holidays, but he was greatly disappointed. It kept leaking even after curing it and follow the directions exactly how it says. It's only cute to keep for decoration
customer_reviews.author: chiara

customer_reviews.title: One star
customer_reviews.text: made in china quality level Follow up...downgrade to 1 star (or less). After a month of filling with water and trying to get it to swell to the point of not leaking I've given up. Still will not swell tight and the bands are leaving disgusting black rust everywhere. Also the "shut off" bung stopper does not (shut off) and also leaks. If the barrel had ever stopped leaking I was planning on just using a rubber stopper to seal that hole, but not even going to waste me money on that now.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Mostar

customer_reviews.title: It lasted only 7 months and fell apart. Look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift to my dad for Christmas, only months after of using it did it begin to fall apart. The wooden cap rotted and had to be replaced with duct tape and then it sprung a leak. Only got a little bit of alcohol made out of it, that filled maybe a 1/4 of a bottle.Had to throw the thing away.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Bryner

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift and they have loved it so far! We really found the included instructions helpful and made sure to follow them closely to ensure the barrel wouldn't leak. 3 batches have been made and consumed and we've purchased additional essences since! Awesome kit for a beginner whiskey fan
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't stop leaking. :(
customer_reviews.text: I got this barrel for my husband on Xmas, he was very happy with it, but cant stop leaking! He's been so patient, he truly liked it.... Dont want to leave a negative feedback, contact me please.
customer_reviews.author: KR.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as an anniversary gift for my husband. He loves it! So far, he’s used it to age a bourbon, and loved the results.
customer_reviews.author: Maeghan Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works great - as long as you follow the instructions to seal it before use
customer_reviews.author: GoG8RS

customer_reviews.title: My husband thought it was a cool gift.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping.very neat item. My husband thought it was a cool gift.
customer_reviews.author: JNJCH13

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product ages whiskey very well. If you are aging a neutral spirit I would let a batch of your favorite aged spirit sit in it for a week to help guide the flavor of your unaged one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B.

customer_reviews.title: Husband approved!
customer_reviews.text: Husband is currently aging his own whiskey, and he loves this little barrel. May go back and purchase others.
customer_reviews.author: Casey001500

customer_reviews.title: we love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my boyfriend for Christmas last year, we love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: my dad who is a huge scotch lover had a ...
customer_reviews.text: my dad who is a huge scotch lover had a lot of gin with this and every time we make a new batch it tastes better
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great look
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband's birthday and he loved it. He was really excited to make his own whisky. It's also super adorable. I thought it would be bigger, but it's enough. They send you enough product to make whisky twice. My husband said his came out slightly weaker than he thought but he liked the process. He will use the barrel to store store bought whisky after he finishes what he made.
customer_reviews.author: JenniH

customer_reviews.title: Leakage
customer_reviews.text: The directions were straight forward and simple. I had a problem with the barrel leaking. The only time I attempted to use it, I practically wasted 1.75L of bourbon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: when we poured out the water it was already a nice caramel color and a smoky scent
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to our son for his 21st birthday. Arrived quickly and just as described. We followed the directions precisely and there were no leaks in our 3 hour initial curing period, when we poured out the water it was already a nice caramel color and a smoky scent. The barrel held exactly one liter of white whiskey from our local distillery. So excited to try the product in 3 months! Saved the malt whisky flavor to use later in the barrel with vodka. Well made product with easy directions and reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: james d witges ameren

customer_reviews.title: Awesome item
customer_reviews.text: A definite must have as an addition and conversation piece.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Evans

customer_reviews.title: Got a lot of attention as an anniversary gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband as an anniversary gift. While the novelty of it was fun and he got a lot of enjoyment out of posting the "amazing gift" he got and having tons of people comment on it, there isn't a lot of interest in actually using it. It's kind of a hassle that you have to prep the barrel before you can use it, etc. Overall, the "Wow" factor was there but it fell sort of flat with the execution.
customer_reviews.author: JennyB

customer_reviews.title: Poor spigot design
customer_reviews.text: The spigot design is very poor. It just a small piece of wood on the handle glue to a aluminum tube and the glue doesn't hold too well. This broken out while I was in the process of clean the barrel to age my wine and it come off. The oak wood is very good. The build is good, the stand are too cheap can be broken easy. This spigot need to be redesign with all wood or a one piece at the handle to turn for the wine to come out.
customer_reviews.author: SuPeRMaN

customer_reviews.title: Got it for someone as a present. Still aging ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it for someone as a present. Still aging, but the leaks that everyone talked about he has yet to see any. Which was my only concern when purchasing this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good idea...
customer_reviews.text: Leaked from day one! It was a gift, so needless to say my hubby was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chorak

customer_reviews.title: great idea and sounds fun
customer_reviews.text: Leaks quite a bit, great idea and sounds fun, but leaks
customer_reviews.author: Butterflykisses8i8

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift, and received it within two days as promised by amazon prime. There are no instructions that I found, but I did do some research and made sure I rinsed it out well (about 5-6 times) to get any of the wood chippings out. I also filled it with hot water and let it sit over as per other instructions online. I will update this review after a few weeks to see what flavor the whiskey takes from the barrel.
customer_reviews.author: Ana C Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Barrel age is all the rage!
customer_reviews.text: Similar as to what a previous review stated, I discovered barrel-aged Manhattans on a business trip in in upscale steakhouse, and I then knew that I needed to make my own. I picked this kit to do it with. Delivery was quick, instructions to prepare the barrel were simple & clear, and putting together the good bourbon (you can also use rye), Carpano Antica vermouth and orange bitters was fun to do (don't use cheap booze!). The result after a couple months made the holiday party special, and the vendor was great to deal with as well.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: He Likes It!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Christmas. Hes always difficult to buy for but this was a hit! So far he's made bourbon, which he is very hapoy with. Currently he has whiskey in the barrel. He plans to make Scotch next, which is his drink of choice! If you have a person who is difficult to buy for I'd definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it can be a bit of fun. It took us about 15 minutes to clean ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dad for his birthday, and while its expensive and a bit of a gimmick, it can be a bit of fun. It took us about 15 minutes to clean and prepare the barrel, not including the 3 hour dry time, and it was fairly simple to fill the barrel with vodka and pour the malt flavoring in. This system would benefit from a funnel, or a wider hole at the top; we had to scour our house for a funnel so we wouldn't spill everything.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Decent Whiskey
customer_reviews.text: The barrel spout did leak constantly despite various tries to stop the leak. The whiskey was decent. If I could figure out a way to stop the leak, I would make more whiskey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They make my favorite bourbons even better
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th barrel. They make my favorite bourbons even better. I'll be buying a few more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Darrin C.

customer_reviews.title: Good whiskey ager!
customer_reviews.text: Great idea for a gift or just if you like whiskey! Be sure to rinse out the barrel before using it. Boyfriend loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product for a whiskey lover
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for a whiskey lover. Follow the care instructions before use. It's worth the couple hours of patience to prep it properly. You can simply age whiskey in it or you can pre-mix your favorite drinks. I've used it to age my favorite bourbon a little. I've also pre-mixed manhattans in it. There's some simple recipes you can find online. Also, you don't have to just use whiskey. I haven't tried any other liquors in it, but I wan't another small one for aging tequila. Also, just got a 3-L one for my birthday earlier this year.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and attractive looking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift and my boyfriend LOVES it. He filled it with water and left it in the sink and there was very little leaking, just a bit near the spigot. The little stand it comes with is great, and this looks lovely in our kitchen. We have not tried the little bottles of flavorings that came with it yet but are very happy with the barrel itself.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Small but adorable
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my husband for his birthday. He loved it. It stays in his office decorating. Unfortunately he is a little lazy to age the spirit. So the first time I did and he said it was very strong. Maybe my fault because I purchased a cheap vodka. I will try again soon.
customer_reviews.author: CHeuer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with some of the rings having fallen off in transport. Too small to make it worth the price. Returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: Genes

customer_reviews.title: Not just for Scotch
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, well made cask - I just finished aging a batch of delicious Negronis and will definitely be using it again.
customer_reviews.author: S. G. S.

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete order
customer_reviews.text: The malt whiskey flavor didnt come. Barrel is nice though
customer_reviews.author: Max M.

customer_reviews.title: No leaks, no varnish (yay!)
customer_reviews.text: No leaks for us! I think the real trick is to prep it properly with repeated hot water fills until it swells enough that it can’t leak. No varnish on the inside, so safe (and tasty) for aging your own cocktails or spirits. We’re doing an aged Bijou in it. Delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Kitchens and Chemistry

product_meta.title: 1-Liter American White Oak Barrel Whiskey Kit
product_meta.description: Brew Naturally 1-Liter American White Oak aging barrel kit. Each kit includes one 1-liter barrel charred on the inside with a medium char, bung, spigot, barrel stand, two bottles of Highland Malt Scotch Whisky Essence flavor (neutral spirit not included) and Brew Naturally LLC instructions.
feature_bullets: Brew Naturally Kit featuring Deep South Barrels American White Oak Barrel for Aging
Kit includes 1-liter barrel, bung, spigot, barrel stand, 2 bottles Highland Malt Scotch Whiskey essence (please note, essence container may vary) and instructions

Our barrels are handcrafted by a cooper (barrel maker) and then cured (sealed) the first time by you, the user. Any leaks or other issues within the first 90 days, we will replace your barrel at no cost, please contact us. Brew Naturally Instructions Included
Charred on the inside with a Medium Char (we find this to be the most universal for aging spirits), from wood sources across the continental US including California, Missouri and Kentucky

Handcrafted, finished on the outside, with black steel bands. Just like full size barrels, our barrels are held together by pressure of the wood and the metal bands surrounding the barrel. Please follow the instructions for curing your barrel, and enjoy

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars52 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
